class.name: JarSphereSdf
class.brief_description: A signed distance field (SDF) sphere primitive.
class.description: Represents a sphere as a signed distance field (SDF). Defined by a center point and a radius. Can be used as a basic volumetric primitive for constructive solid geometry (CSG), rendering, or physics.

members.member: The origin point of the sphere in 3D space.
The radius of the sphere, determining its size.
